statements: SELECT * FROM LegalPrecedents;
SELECT case_name, jurisdiction, judge_name FROM LegalPrecedents;
SELECT case_id, case_name, case_date FROM LegalPrecedents WHERE jurisdiction = 'Supreme Court';
SELECT * FROM LegalPrecedents ORDER BY case_date DESC;
SELECT case_name, ruling FROM LegalPrecedents WHERE judge_name = 'Judge Smith';
SELECT * FROM LegalPrecedents WHERE jurisdiction = 'USA';
SELECT case_name, case_date FROM LegalPrecedents WHERE judge_name = 'John Smith' ORDER BY case_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_cases FROM LegalPrecedents WHERE jurisdiction = 'UK';
SELECT case_name, ruling FROM LegalPrecedents WHERE case_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' AND jurisdiction = 'Canada';
SELECT * FROM LegalPrecedents WHERE judge_name IN ('Mary Johnson', 'David Lee') ORDER BY case_date ASC;
SELECT id, case_number, court, decision_date, case_summary FROM legal_precedents WHERE id = 1;
SELECT judge_name, years_on_bench FROM judges WHERE years_on_bench > 10;
SELECT court, case_summary, decision_date FROM legal_precedents WHERE court = 'Supreme Court';
SELECT id, case_number FROM legal_precedents ORDER BY decision_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM judges WHERE judge_name LIKE 'Judge%';
SELECT * FROM legal_precedents WHERE court='Supreme Court' ORDER BY decision_date DESC;
SELECT judge_name,count(*) as case_count FROM judges GROUP BY judge_name HAVING count(*) > 10;
SELECT id, court FROM legal_precedents WHERE judge_id IN (SELECT id FROM judges WHERE years_on_bench > 20);
SELECT MAX(years_on_bench) as max_years_on_bench FROM judges;
SELECT id, court, decision_date FROM legal_precedents WHERE court='District Court' AND YEAR(decision_date)=2021 ORDER BY decision_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM legal_precedents;
SELECT case_name, court_name, judge_name FROM legal_precedents;
SELECT case_name, decision_date FROM legal_precedents WHERE court_name = 'Supreme Court';
SELECT * FROM legal_citations WHERE citation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT topic_name, related_cases FROM legal_topics;
SELECT case_id, case_name FROM legal_precedents;
SELECT * FROM legal_citations WHERE citation_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT topic_name, JSONB_ARRAY_LENGTH(related_cases) FROM legal_topics;
SELECT * FROM legal_precedents WHERE decision_date < '2020-12-31' ORDER BY decision_date DESC;
SELECT case_name, court_name, COUNT(citing_case_id) FROM legal_precedents JOIN legal_citations ON case_id = citing_case_id GROUP BY case_name, court_name;
SELECT * FROM cases;
SELECT case_title, court_name, judge_name FROM cases WHERE case_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT lawyer_name, law_firm FROM lawyers ORDER BY lawyer_name ASC;
SELECT issue_description FROM legal_issues WHERE case_id = 123;
SELECT precedent_text FROM precedents WHERE case_id = 456 ORDER BY precedent_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM cases ORDER BY case_date DESC, case_title ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT case_id, case_title, court_name FROM cases WHERE judge_name = 'Judge Smith';
SELECT * FROM lawyers WHERE law_firm = 'Law Firm A' AND lawyer_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY lawyer_name ASC;

SELECT cases.case_title, legal_issues.issue_description FROM cases JOIN legal_issues ON cases.case_id = legal_issues.case_id WHERE legal_issues.issue_description LIKE '%fraud%' ORDER BY case_title ASC;
SELECT case_id, case_date, COUNT(*) AS num_precedents FROM precedents GROUP BY case_id HAVING num_precedents >= 3 ORDER BY num_precedents DESC;
SELECT * FROM legal_cases;
SELECT case_name, court_name, case_date FROM legal_cases WHERE judge_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT case_name, case_decision FROM legal_cases ORDER BY case_date DESC;
SELECT party_name, party_type FROM case_parties WHERE case_id = 123;
SELECT category_name FROM case_categories WHERE category_id > 5;
SELECT * FROM legal_cases WHERE case_date = '2022-01-20';
SELECT case_name, judge_name, case_decision FROM legal_cases WHERE court_name = 'Supreme Court';
SELECT case_name, judge_name, case_decision FROM legal_cases WHERE judge_name = 'Judge Smith' ORDER BY case_date DESC;
SELECT party_name, party_type FROM case_parties WHERE party_type = 'Plaintiff' AND case_id = 101;
SELECT detail_description, detail_type FROM case_details WHERE case_id = 202 ORDER BY detail_type ASC, detail_description DESC;
